snippet: The Los Angeles Galaxy defender Omar Gonzalez is going on loan to Nuremberg of the German Bundesliga until the end of February it was announced Thursday.
abstract: The Los Angeles Galaxy defender Omar Gonzalez is going on loan to Nuremberg of the German Bundesliga until the end of February it was announced Thursday.
lead_paragraph: 11:45 a.m. Jan. 6 | Updated With Gonzalez's Injury Omar Gonzalez tore the anterior cruciate ligament in his left knee in his first practice with Nuremberg of Germany's Bundesliga and is returning to Los Angeles.

headline.main: Galaxy's Gonzalez Goes to Germany on Loan
